title: What is JSON Schema
description: JSON Schema is a vocabulary used to describe and validate the structure of JSON data. It defines what properties an object can have, their types, required fields, and more.

points.definition: A preferably short description about the purpose of the instance described by the schema.
Lists the fields inside an object, each with their own schema.
Marks which fields must be present.
An explanation about the purpose of the instance described by the schema.
Defines a set of allowed values.
Define semantic information about a string instance.
